name: Daily Patrol
info: Patrol the city districts and maintain public safety. Help the guard captain keep the peace by checking key areas. Eliminate threats and gather evidence of criminal activity. Resets daily at midnight.
dialogs: The city needs constant vigilance to stay safe. Are you ready for today's patrol?
Take these orders and check each district. Report any suspicious activity immediately.
I'm ready to serve and protect the citizens.
Remember - the safety of our people depends on your thoroughness. Good luck out there.
Those thieves have been hitting our stalls all week! Please help us!
I've been hearing strange noises at night. Could you check around our homes?
Smugglers have been using our docks to move illegal goods. We need your help.
Excellent work today. Your patrol has made our city much safer.
All districts secured, captain. Evidence and contraband confiscated.
The citizens can sleep peacefully tonight thanks to your efforts. Well done, guard.
accept: I'm ready to serve and protect the citizens.
decline: I have other duties to attend to.
